mapper.select: SELECT trip_id, task_id, address, detailed_address, created_date, status, client_name, contact_tel, contact_email, note FROM business_trips WHERE task_id = #{taskId}
SELECT trip_id, task_id, address, detailed_address, created_date, status, client_name, contact_tel, contact_email, note FROM business_trips WHERE trip_id = #{tripId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_trips (task_id, address, detailed_address, created_date, status, client_name, contact_tel, contact_email, note) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{address}, #{detailedAddress}, #{createdDate}, '미방문', #{clientName}, #{contactTel}, #{contactEmail}, #{note})
